(Program
  (For
    (SequenceExpression
      (Assignment
        (Identifier)
        (Float))
      (Call
        (Identifier)
        (Empty)))
    (LessThan
      (Identifier)
    { (Float)
    ->(Float) })
    (Update
      (Identifier))
    (
      (Call
        (Identifier)
        (Identifier)
        (Empty)))))
